Reviews.Title: An EXCELLENT cellphone!
Reviews.Author: Miles Miller "Miles"
Reviews.Content: The previous one star reviewer states it was HIS fault because he didn't check it out! From personal use this cellphone works flawlessly! Never an issue! With slide out keyboard and excellent color graphics it's a fantastic value! If a person is looking for a handy size cellphone, with excellent features, and reasonably priced, they should consider the Samsung Messager Touch!!!

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Alicia Smith
Reviews.Content: Not what I was expecting. It is not an up to date cricket phone. it was flashed, only a basic flash, so i can only get talk and txt.

Reviews.Title: Slider Phone from Cricket
Reviews.Author: pattiu73
Reviews.Content: My husband loves this phone! He says that he really likes the slide feature because now his phone doesnt call 911 all the time. He isnt sure if it is the phone or the service  causing weak reception in our house

Reviews.Title: WORST PHONE EVER!
Reviews.Author: aq643
Reviews.Content: I "had" this phone since Christmas 2011.I have had this model of phone replaced over three times!Pros-Full keyboard-Medium size screen-Record Video & Take PicturesCons1st phone model-Software stopped working-Battery said it was charging when it wasn't-Couldn't check battery life on main screen, had to go to the camera app to see-Turned on and off on its own2nd phone model-Battery said it was charging when it wasn't-Eventually couldn't respond to text messages-Battery short circuited & died on the charger3rd phone model-Battery dies fast (have to charge 3/4 times a day)-Home screen unlocks on its own-Apps move on home screen on there own-Screen will go horizontal on its own when keyboard closes

Reviews.Title: The phone I had ever
Reviews.Author: ImprovErgoSum
Reviews.Content: This is the very best phone I ever had. It slides up and has a full keyboard. It is easy to use and navigate. When I receive texts or phone calls the phone rings or vibrates until you tell it not to. With other phones, including Galaxy 2 and a Kuwai I currently had, unless you are paying attention, you never realize you received texts unless you are contantly checking! What a waste of life to be constantly checking for texts or messages when your bloody phone can make you aware that you have either voice mail or texts. This phone is a no nonsense phone. I wish other modern phones were as smart as this one. I am looking for one but the only one they are selling is $99 used! That is what I paid for mine 4 years ago, it was good until it gave up the ghost (screen went kaput) 2 months ago. Since then I had had other phones that just have made my life miserable. I miss this phones features.

Reviews.Title: I'm so sad.
Reviews.Author: Mona
Reviews.Content: I was my fault that I didn't read the full description but in my defence, I typede in phone from Cricket Wireless and this popped up. Since it IS from Allltel, it wasn't fully flashed and was a waste of my money honestly. And I like the keyboard but I wanted a touch screen also that typed but this doesn't. So sad, I do not recommend this!
